Name: Blood Moon: The Last Stand
About the game: The Blood Prophecy has come to pass and the red moon has appeared, now the hordes of defiled march against all of mankind. You are Mors, the last standing member of the order that watches over this prophecy. Alone, you have to face the defiled and make time for our only hope ... Features: -Challenging 2D shooter game where you have to actively move , attack and defend to survive. -Gritty pre-rendered graphics inspired by early 90s hits such as Diablo 1 and Mortal Kombat. -Use your abilities in the right moment! Managing your special resource to either use your special attack or heal yourself is key! -30 levels that will test your skill! -Fight over 20 different type of abominations including 4 huge bosses. -Test yourself against infinite waves of enemies in the Endless Mode! Kill as many as you can! -Detailed Codex featuring information and art of all the enemies you encounter.
